participant_1.background:
I pray to God for my family every morning and I eat well, but I have never been married.
i have not been on a date since high school.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself.
I remember getting lost in a library for hours as a child.

I have my number and my freedom.
I enjoy watching my favorite childhood cartoons.
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love.
i listen to podcasts.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm about to go do some grocery shopping. What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm currently at the library, looking for some books.
Oh, that's nice! What kind of books are you looking for?
I'm looking for some books about gardening. I've always loved gardening, and I'm looking to learn more about it.
Oh, that's great! I love gardening too. I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it nonetheless.
That's okay! I'm not very good at it either, but I'm learning.
I've been watching a lot of YouTube videos about gardening. It's really helpful.
I'll have to check that out! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! What are some of your favorite vegetables to grow?
I love growing tomatoes. They're so delicious and easy to grow.
Me too! I love making tomato sauce with fresh tomatoes.
That's a great idea! I'll have to try that.
You should! It's so much better than store-bought tomato sauce.
I'm sure it is. Thanks for the tip
